replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
1. 要visual包 具体去百度
2. 从官网下 论坛的老了 http://www.delorie.com/gnu/docs/mc/mcedit.1.html 
64的下64 32的下32 根据自己的系统
3. 运行时确保mc完全关闭 不然会毁档的

replies.author: az874885336
replies.txt_content: 我想问的是：为什么我的MCEdit运行不了？总是说什么“系统无法执行指定程序”  “什么程序配置不正确”。求助啊！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
看它的網頁說明
Q: "The application could not start because the application configuration is incorrect" or similar
A: Install the Visual C 2008 Runtime from Microsoft.

它的下載頁
http://davidvierra.com/mcedit/download.html
Windows: You may need to install this Visual C Runtime .
